com.kinvey.persistence
Class EntityCollection

java.lang.Object
  com.kinvey.persistence.EntityCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollectionFetch<EntityDict>
Direct Known Subclasses:
UserCollection
public class EntityCollection
extends Object
implements CollectionFetch<EntityDict>

A list of EntityDict objects that is retrieved using Kinvey's appdata API.

This class is only intended for fetching objects. If any of the objects are modified they must be persisted manually using the EntityDict.save(ScalarCallback) method of the individual object.

EntityCollection

public EntityCollection(KCSClient client,
                        String collectionName)
Collection data fetcher used to obtain multiple EntityDict instances from kinvey service. This constructor makes use of a default implementation of SimpleQuery

Parameters:
client -
collectionName -

EntityCollection

public EntityCollection(KCSClient client,
                        String collectionName,
                        SimpleQuery query)
Collection fetcher class used to obtain multiple EntityDict instances from kinvey service.

Parameters:
client - used to gain access to kinvey service settings
collectionName - the name of the kinvey entity collection
query - usually a SimpleQuery instance, which is used to construct queries to the service

EntityCollection

protected EntityCollection(KCSClient client,
                           String collectionName,
                           SimpleQuery query,
                           com.kinvey.net.RequestBuilderFactory rbfactory)
Used directly only in testing. Override the request builder by providing a different RequestBuilderFactory.

Parameters:
client - used to gain access to kinvey service settings
collectionName - the name of the kinvey entity collection
query - usually a SimpleQuery instance, which is used to construct queries to the service
rbfactory - override the default RequestBuilder used, generally only used to mock the RequestBuilder

EntityCollection

protected EntityCollection(KCSClient client,
                           String dataPath,
                           String collectionName,
                           SimpleQuery query,
                           com.kinvey.net.RequestBuilderFactory rbfactory)
Used by UserCollection to create a EntityCollection that provides access to other data paths (user, etc)

Parameters:
client - used to gain access to kinvey service settings
dataPath - used to construct a baseurl that points to this other app resource ('user', '')
collectionName - the name of the kinvey entity collection
query - usually a SimpleQuery instance, which is used to construct queries to the service
rbfactory - override the default RequestBuilder used, generally only used to mock the RequestBuilder
